articles.description: An arthritis drug coupled with a strict diet cutting out meat and dairy could potentially cure some cancers, a new study from Imperial College London and London's Institute of Cancer Research suggests
articles.content:
An arthritis drug coupled with a strict diet cutting out meat and dairy could potentially cure some cancers, research suggests.
Scientists demonstrated the treatment killed tumours which rely on fat… [+4083 chars]

articles.author: Nick McDermott
articles.title: Healthy 13-day-old baby is UK’s youngest coronavirus victim as 135 more deaths confirmed - The Scottish Sun
articles.content:
A HEALTHY 13-day-old baby has been confirmed as the UK's youngest coronavirus victim after 135 more people died in the past 24 hours.
